solution_line_template: There are {pepperoni_pieces}*{ham_multiplier} = <<{pepperoni_pieces}*{ham_multiplier}={ham_pieces}>>{ham_pieces} pieces of ham put on the pizza.
There are {pepperoni_pieces}+{sausage_additional_pieces} = <<{pepperoni_pieces}+{sausage_additional_pieces}={sausage_pieces}>>{sausage_pieces} pieces of sausage put on the pizza.
There are {pepperoni_pieces}/{total_slices} = <<{pepperoni_pieces}/{total_slices}={pepperoni_per_slice}>>{pepperoni_per_slice} pieces of pepperoni on each pizza slice.
There are {ham_pieces}/{total_slices} = <<{ham_pieces}/{total_slices}={ham_per_slice}>>{ham_per_slice} pieces of ham on each pizza slice.
There are {sausage_pieces}/{total_slices} = <<{sausage_pieces}/{total_slices}={sausage_per_slice}>>{sausage_per_slice} pieces of sausage on each pizza slice.

There are {pepperoni_per_slice}+{ham_per_slice}+{sausage_per_slice} = <<{pepperoni_per_slice}+{ham_per_slice}+{sausage_per_slice}={total_meat_per_slice}>>{total_meat_per_slice} pieces altogether on each slice of pizza.
